title: Kyle Wandel Portfolio
text:
This website represents some of the work that I have done as a data analyst in recent years.
I am currently a Manager of industry analysis and business intelligence for the Consumer Technology Association (CTA). My primary role for CTA is to oversee and manage our forecast data program. Using both internal and external data sets, I create various reports and analysis to help the industry in a variety of ways. I would consider myself an expert in how the technology industry/market is performing from a sales perpesctive and how emerging technologies and trends are impacting the industry.
I live in Fairfax, VA with my wonderful wife Courtney and our 3 incredibly cuddly and anxious animals. We have two dogs, Buddy and Maximus and a cat named Bentley.
I am an avid sports enthusiast and probably know the sports world more than I do the technology industry. My favorite sport to watch, talk, analyze and write about is football, but I really love all sports.
I am originally from Ohio and am a die hard Cleveland Browns, Cavaliers and Guardians fan. I grew up in Columbus, so THE Ohio State University and the Buckeyes will forever be number one in my heart.
Analyzing and tracking data has always been a passion of mine and I incorporate it in everything that I do. From pacing and tracking my times training for triathlons to arguing about sports, I believe data is the key to everything.

title: Personal Projects
text:
About me
I am an experienced Data Analyst with a demonstrated history of working in the healthcare and consumer technology industries. Skilled in Microsoft Office, DBMS, business intelligence and data analytics. Strong data oriented professional graduated from Bowling Green State University.

title: About Me
text:
Summary:
Self-motivated Business Intelligence Manager with 8 years of experience in business intelligence, and data analysis, and customer/member relations. Proficient in Microsoft environment and experienced in driving cross-functional adoption of CRM tools and strategies. Skilled in data manipulation, user management, and implementing best practices. Adept at conducting market research, developing reports, and delivering actionable insights. Strong collaborator with excellent communication and training abilities.
Education:
Bachelor’s Degree in Business Administration, Analytics and Intelligence
Bowling Green State University, Bowling Green, Ohio
December 2015
Professional Experience:
Manager, Business Intelligence | Consumer Technology Association | 03/2019 – PRESENT
Manage CTA’s semi-annual technology industry 5-year forecasts, tracking shipment units, average price, and revenues for over 250 consumer technology products and services.
Conduct interviews and distributed surveys to association members for data collection purposes, ensuring accurate forecasting and strengthen member relations.
Utilized R to perform advanced data mining analysis and regression modeling on member engagement data.
Created a membership engagement scorecard to track customer engagement and identify specific trends.
Developed forecast modeling tools and interactive Power BI visualizations for CTA analysts and C-level executives.
Perform market research and diagnosis market trends for specific technology products in the industry.
Moderate conference panels to facilitate discussion of industry trends and data analysis
Data Analyst | NCI Inc. – AdvanceMed, Midwest Zone | 09/2017 – 03/2019
Utilized SAS – Enterprise Guide and SQL to develop complex queries and scripts for investigative purposes.
Performed in-depth evaluation and analysis of potential fraud cases using claims information and other data sources.
Collaborated with Statisticians and Sr. Data Analysts to perform statistical sampling and extrapolations.
Communicated data analysis results effectively to internal and external stakeholders.
Utilized SQL stored procedures and joins to query data and create reports.
Consultant | Duty First Consulting | 01/2016 – 08/2017
Assisted in writing proposals and created training materials for the Centers of Medicare and Medicaid Services (CMS) project.
Communicated and collaborated with clients to produce accurate, timely, thorough deliverables upon client request for various data scenarios and needs.
Used SQL and Excel to execute quality assurance checks on several million lines of certified plan information, preventing inconsistencies in data.
Developed stored procedures to create daily reports for key stakeholders to update stakeholders on the status of the marketplace.
Skills:
Microsoft Products
Data Manipulation and Analysis
Market Research and Trends Analysis
Advanced Data Mining and Regression Analysis (R, SQL)
Power BI and Data Visualization
Project Management
Excellent Communication and Training Abilities
Collaboration and Stakeholder Engagement
